Class GraphIncidenceMat<V>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
V - type value if vertex.
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class GraphIncidenceMat<V> extends Object implements Graph<V>
Implementation of Graph. In this realization order of edge is important.
